reviews.customers_say: Customers love this sweater dress for its flattering fit that hugs curves without being too tight, and its soft, comfortable material that doesn't irritate the skin.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous, Comfortable, and a Perfect Fit!
items.body: This dress is absolutely gorgeous and fits beautifully. I normally wear a size large, and the large fit me perfectly. The material is soft, buttery, and feels high-quality. The color is exactly as shown in the photos, which is always a nice surprise. I can’t wait to wear this dress! I’m planning to pair it with some cute leggings for a cozy, stylish look. The length is perfect as well—I'm 5'8", and the dress hits right above my knees, so I don’t have to worry about showing anything when I bend over. I love it so much that I’m already thinking about ordering another one in a different color. It’s just that cute! Read more
items.author: S.B.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute sweater dress
items.body: The sweater dress is thick, nice, soft and most importantly NOT ITCHY. It’s stretchy and forgiving. I initially purchased an XS which also fit, but was shorter. I sized up because I wanted the dress to hang at an appropriate length for family photos. I’m 5’3” 119 lbs and am wearing a size S. Read more
items.author: L

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft and cozy!
items.body: The dress fit true to size. I am 5’4 and 190 lbs and ordered my normal size XL. The fabric is so soft and warm but not too thick that I’d overheat. I am very sensitive to textures and it’s hard to find sweaters that the fabric doesn’t bother me, so happy I found this! Added a belt to cinch the waist. Ordering more colors now! Read more
items.author: Wil

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute, flattering, wrong color, see-through
items.body: Pros: -The fit is right. I ordered Small. 5'2", 154 lbs. -The dress is flattering and the design/fit are as advertised. Cons: -Color doesn't look the same as pictured. I ordered the dress in dark green, and in the picture it looks like a deep pine or Christmas green, but the dress is army green. -When the fabric stretches, you can see through it. Little openings form in the fabric and my light grey bra was visible. This could be fixed with a black bra if you're okay with this quality. Read more
items.author: CatMom91

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it!!
items.body: I purchased this for a Christmas party, and I have never been so excited to wear a dress! It fits perfectly - the thickness, quality, and softness of the fabric is surprisingly spot on for the price! I saw a similar dress at a dept store, and it was $20more. So I thought I would try this one first. I’m soooo glad I did!! I’m very curvy with DD/DDD - XL fits perfectly! I love that you can wear the neck differently too! Read more
items.author: Cla

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress
items.body: 5’4” 127 & 67 yrs old, I do not like how I look in dresses, but this dress changes that! It’s soft, non itchy , comes to about 2” above knee, not terribly clingy, I bought medium, exactly as described, just an overall nice dress for any occasion! Looks great with knee high boots .not even wrinkled on arrival ! Read more
items.author: loraine

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Winter must have
items.body: Super comfortable, very thick, and freaking love this! Super warm not thin. The length is just right not too short but not to long either. Read more
items.author: Stephanie Guerrero

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy winter dress
items.body: Im not a fan of ordering clothes from Amazon but I really have to tell you gils this sweater dress was very nice and had a great fit. Comfortable and classy. It also keeps you very warm it’s made out of a nice soft woven material. Read more
items.author: Jennifer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Solid Sky Blue, Solid Peacock Blue, Solid Grey, Solid Purple, Apricot, Solid White, Solid Pure Red, Solid Red, Solid Green, Solid Lavender, Solid Light Apricot, Solid Brown, Solid Light Orange, Solid Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
